name: online-store
description: **Authors:** - Erik Stor√•s Sommer - Adrian Tokle Storset - Mats Nome Sommervold, s341829

scripts.up: DB_GATEWAY='mongodb' DB_PROTOCOL='mongodb' DB_HOST='mongodb' DB_PORT='27017' DB_NAME='development' DB_ROOT_USER='root' DB_ROOT_PWD='rootpassword' DB_AUTH_USER='fullaccessuser' DB_AUTH_PWD='fullaccesspassword' DB_USER='regularuser' DB_PWD='regularpassword' AUTH_SERVER_PORT='3000' AUTH_SERVER_EVENTS='server, mode, fatal, tips, database, accept, reject, debug' AUTH_SERVER_ERRORS='all' AUTH_SERVER_TRACEBACKS='all' RESOURCE_SERVER_PORT='3000' RESOURCE_SERVER_EVENTS='server, mode, fatal, tips, database, accept, reject, error, debug' RESOURCE_SERVER_ERRORS='all' RESOURCE_SERVER_TRACEBACKS='all' AUTH_SERVER_FLAGS='--inspect=0.0.0.0' RESOURCE_SERVER_FLAGS='--inspect=0.0.0.0' FRONTEND_SERVER_PORT='3000' CART_TIMEOUT=3600000 ADMIN_EMAIL='admin@sahara.com' ADMIN_PWD='Password1#' HASHING_SECRET='thisisthehashingsecret' PUBLIC_HOST='localhost' PUBLIC_PORT='80' docker-compose up --build
